text: "I hope you find this information useful
column5: hurting this business is far from my intention

column8: I was invited to invite 2 ladies
column11: I paid the bill as it may be expected and it is normal for me to generously do .... our 3 dishes were a combination of the same ingredients except the drinks .... the flavors were good
column14: tasty which had plenty of beef fibers
column15: ligaments and or tendons which the chef did not remove prior to grilling it and serving it so we had to chew until it was too difficult
column16: cumbersome and we had to shamefully but diplomatically remove it from our mouths into napkins .... I would have to try all other dishes to be fair in my public opinion but I will not be able to anytime soon
column17: I wished the grilled tasty meat had no tendons in it oh well
column18: we ate 90% and mine made me sleepy soon after so I believe it was nutritious...."

text: 'Received delivery 5/14/20 loved kimchi tater tots with Korean bacon and pork dumplings. Also

The bowl and burrito were to have sauces but nothing came on them. I recommend extra sauces like Clinatro lime or Katsu on the side. I was very impressed overall and would recommend to anyone who like Korean fast food.'

text: 'Good place for fast-casual Korean food. The options may lead to decision paralysis
column5: but it would be difficult to find a combination of the choices which would lead to poor taste. It is a shame though that the only pork option is bacon and not any pork bulgogi. The tables are a bit too close together

author: Helen Ye
text: 'Very friendly staff. We got the Earl Grey tea rolled ice cream and it was delicious! There are unlimited toppings too. Would recommend getting the homemade meringue cookies as a topping'

author: Surf Ace
text: 'Love the fresh ingredients and good size portion. The pickled vegetables add another dimension of flavor to the bowl or burrito. Sometimes I order two for both lunch and dinner!'

author: Mitchie
text: "Such a great and convienent place! Location is just a 5 min walk away from the train station and it's a nice
column5: cozy atmosphere. I went here around 1 week after they opened to try out the rolled ice cream and it was heaven. You get to watch the guy make it in front of you and it's such a fun experience. Went there this evening before work and tried out the bowl for the first time and it was so yummy. I got the Korean Fried Rice and chicken breast
column6: and for the sides I had the water cress
column8: cheese and sriracha sour cream.  Honestly
column9: for how cheap the price was
column10: they give you a lot of food with great flavors. Luckily
column11: my job is only a bit over a block away from the place. Definitely my new holy grail! Can't to try more flavors from here. The workers are very nice as well!"

author: Bhadesh Basdeo
text: 'The Korean version of chipotle. Very good food.'
